dict.acceptation: 地区；某地区的人；与某处邻近的地区；临近街坊；

sent.orig: Administered 10 neighborhood offices, 115 community neighborhood committee, 83 community workstations, 10 Street police station.
sent.trans: 下辖10个街道办事处，115个社区居委会，83个社区工作站，10个街道派出所。

sent.orig: A neighborhood of fine homes;an ethnic neighborhood.
sent.trans: 拥有美好家园的小区；民族居住区。

sent.orig: The cruel man was called a butcher the neighborhood.
sent.trans: 周围的人都称那个残忍的人是屠夫。

sent.orig: Please tell your pen pal what your neighborhood is like.
sent.trans: 请告述你的笔友你的邻居是什么样的人。

sent.orig: Cards could be seen all over the neighborhood for the grand opening of an Italian restaurant.
sent.trans: 一家意大利餐厅隆重开幕标示牌可以在整个社区看到。
